narrative:
This was a focused inspection on veterinary care issues regarding ear health.
Two dogs, Bichon female ID#0A02162273 and Bichon female ID#0A02154170, were examined by a veterinarian
and received treatment for ear mites on 7/10/14.  Both dogs were noted to have healthy ears on inspection today.
No non-compliant items were identified during this inspection. 
 
Inspection and exit interview conducted with licensee and wife of licensee.
